title: Who will be my Coach/Mentor/Teacher/Guide/Tutor/Senpai/Yi? (Sup)
body: Gold 2 sup, Sona main looking to learn those challenjour strats. Add me if you're looking to help a lower elo player out (not earn money). I'm not ready to pay for a coach yet. Please be Plat 2 Support player or higher, and have some expertise in Sona. THANKKSSS{{champion:37}}
